S2E1.title: The One After Vegas
S2E1.des:
Ross and Rachel wake up together, not realizing
                they got married the night before. Monica and Chandler talk about moving in together.

S2E2.title: The One Where Ross Hugs Rachel
S2E2.des:
Ross has to tell Rachel that they're still
                married. Chandler is moving in with Monica, and Rachel assumes that she'll be living with them.

S2E3.title: The One with Ross's Denial
S2E3.des:
Ross asks Rachel to be his roommate, refusing to
                admit that he still has feelings for her. Monica and Chandler argue about the apartment.

S2E4.title: The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance
S2E4.des:
Joey gets a hernia but doesn't have health
                insurance to cover getting it treated. Ross puts on a British accent while teaching his new class.

S2E5.title: The One with Joey's Porsche
S2E5.des:
Joey pretends that he owns a Porsche. After the
                incident in Vegas, Ross is feeling like a failure because he's about to get his third divorce.

S2E6.title: The One on the Last Night
S2E6.des:
Joey is broke but won't accept help from his
                friends, so Chandler lets him "win" money in a game. Rachel gets ready to move and fights with
                Monica.

S2E7.title: The One Where Phoebe Runs
S2E7.des:
Phoebe looks goofy when she runs, so Rachel is
                embarrassed to go jogging with her. Joey is attracted to his new roommate, Janine.

S2E8.title: The One with Ross's Teeth
S2E8.des:
Ross whitens his teeth to impress a girl, but he
                goes way overboard. Phoebe tells Rachel that she hooked up with Ralph Lauren.

S2E9.title: The One Where Ross Got High
S2E9.des:
Monica and Ross's parents don't like Chandler
                because they think he smoked pot in college. Rachel makes a disgusting Thanksgiving dessert.

S2E10.title: The One with the Routine
S2E10.des:
Joey, Ross and Monica dance on "Dick Clark's New
                Year's Rockin' Eve." The rest of the gang searches for Monica's hidden Christmas presents.

S2E11.title: The One with the Apothecary Table
S2E11.des:
Rachel buys a table from a fancy store and tells
                Phoebe she got it at the flea market. Janine tells Joey that she doesn't like Monica and Chandler.

S2E12.title: The One with the Joke
S2E12.des:
Chandler and Ross both try to take credit for a
                joke. Monica is insulted when Phoebe says Rachel would make a better girlfriend than her.

S2E13.title: The One with Rachel's Sister
S2E13.des:
Rachel's sister, Jill, comes to Rachel for help
                after her parents cut her off financially. Working as a waiter, Joey hits on the Central Perk
                customers.

S2E14.title: The One Where Chandler Can't Cry
S2E14.des:
When Chandler says he hardly ever cries,
                everyone tries to make it happen. Rachel's sister, Jill, dates Ross to annoy Rachel.

S2E15.title: The One That Could Have Been: Part 1
S2E15.des:
The gang imagines what life would've been like
                if Rachel had married Barry, Phoebe became a business executive and Monica was still fat.

S2E16.title: The One That Could Have Been: Part 2
S2E16.des:
The friends continue to ponder an alternate past
                in which fat Monica seduces Chandler and married Rachel almost cheats on Barry with Joey.

S2E17.title: The One with Unagi
S2E17.des:
When Rachel and Phoebe take a self-defense
                class, Ross claims he's a martial arts expert. Chandler and Monica forget to buy Valentine's Day
                gifts.

S2E18.title: The One Where Ross Dates a Student
S2E18.des:
One of Ross's students asks him on a date. When
                there's a fire in their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe have to stay with Joey or Monica.

S2E19.title: The One with Joey's Fridge
S2E19.des:
Joey tries to convince someone to buy him a new
                fridge. Ross is worried that his girlfriend will cheat on him during spring break.

S2E20.title: The One with Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E
S2E20.des:
Joey's up for the lead in a new TV show, but
                Chandler forgets to leave him a message that the audition time has changed.

S2E21.title: The One Where Ross Meets Elizabeth's Dad
S2E21.des:
Ross makes a bad impression on Elizabeth's dad,
                who doesn't approve of them dating. But Elizabeth's dad takes an interest in Rachel.

S2E22.title: The One Where Paul's the Man
S2E22.des:
Ross and Elizabeth sneak off to the family
                cabin, where Rachel and Paul -- who threatened to have Ross fired for dating a student -- are also
                headed.

S2E23.title: The One with the Ring
S2E23.des:
Phoebe is the only one who knows that Chandler
                is going to propose to Monica, and she lies to Ross to keep him from finding out.

S2E24.title: The One with the Proposal: Part 1
S2E24.des:
Chandler's plan to propose to Monica is
                interrupted when they run into Richard. Joey accidentally buys a boat for $20,000 at a silent
                auction.

S2E25.title: The One with the Proposal: Part 2
S2E25.des:
Richard tells Monica he still loves her.
                Chandler's attempt to make the proposal a surprise leaves Monica thinking he doesn't want to marry
                her.

year:
In Season 6 of the Emmy-winning series, Ross doesn't
            tell Rachel that their accidental marriage was never annulled, but he does tell Phoebe.
about:
In Season 6 of the Emmy-winning series, Ross doesn't
            tell Rachel that their accidental marriage was never annulled, but he does tell Phoebe.
